comments:
Students reported learning “so much about part of human language,” though one
student felt they “did not have enough time to cover material” adequately. One student
also felt the course was more of a “survey of grammar than an actual conlanging course.”
Students noted the course was “a great way to get people into linguistics and… a lot of
fun.”
One student reported that he hopes “Professor Legate continues to teach” LING
140. Another student complained that “there was too little feedback” on graded
assignments.
Students thought the course “should not have been a 100-level course,” as it often
applied linguistics concepts that students new to the subject had not seen before. There
was relatively little work, one student noted, but the “weekly quizzes were somewhat
challenging.”
